Babel.1

The first thing you sense is the smell of grass, then upon some moments next is the sight of a wall with a facade of a thousand styles.

Thus is your first meeting with the megastructure; thus you are welcomed to Babel.

Some time ago there was a researcher who made a thorough examination of the structure. It was the 3rd chapter on his series called 'The Great Wonders of Magical Architecture'
